khachaturian.gloss: Russian composer (born in Armenia) whose works are romantic and reflect his interest in folk music (1903-1978)

khadafy.gloss: Libyan leader who seized power in a military coup d'etat in 1969

khaddar.gloss: a coarse homespun cotton cloth made in India

khadi.gloss: a coarse homespun cotton cloth made in India

khalif.gloss: the civil and religious leader of a Muslim state considered to be a representative of Allah on earth

khalifah.gloss: the civil and religious leader of a Muslim state considered to be a representative of Allah on earth

khalka.gloss: the Mongol people living in the central and eastern parts of Outer Mongolia

khalkha.gloss: the Mongol people living in the central and eastern parts of Outer Mongolia

khama.gloss: Botswanan statesman who was the first president of Botswana (1921-1980)

khan.gloss: an inn in some eastern countries with a large courtyard that provides accommodation for caravans

khanty.gloss: a member of the nomadic Ugrian people living in northwestern Siberia (east of the Urals)

khartoum.gloss: the capital of Sudan located at the confluence of the Blue Nile and White Nile

khat.gloss: the leaves of the shrub Catha edulis which are chewed like tobacco or used to make tea

khi.gloss: the 22nd letter of the Greek alphabet

khios.gloss: an island in the Aegean Sea off the west coast of Turkey

khirghiz.gloss: a member of a people vast regions of central Siberia

khmer rouge.gloss: a communist organization formed in Cambodia in 1970

khoikhoi.gloss: any of the Khoisan languages spoken by the pastoral people of Namibia and South Africa

khoikhoin.gloss: any of the Khoisan languages spoken by the pastoral people of Namibia and South Africa

khoisan.gloss: nomadic hunters and gatherers who live in southern Africa
a family of languages spoken in southern Africa

khoisan language.gloss: a family of languages spoken in southern Africa

khomeini.gloss: Iranian religious leader of the Shiites

khrushchev.gloss: Soviet statesman and premier who denounced Stalin (1894-1971)

khufu.gloss: Egyptian Pharaoh of the 27th century BC who commissioned the Great Pyramid at Giza
